text:
Thank you, Jon. Wish this was supported so that we could make more interactive blog posts with the help of modules. I was thinking of taking this to something like a quiz.

Like so; read some text, then do this {{ interactive.module.thing }}, read some more and CTA.

Or I am missing something here? Is there a way to break up the {{ content.post_body  }} variable?
<@U38EZFVFE> It's in the body post after some introductory text.
You can use three sperate modules. Lead in module, TOC module and main copy module
